config.schemas¶

Source: src\config\schemas.py

Module Overview¶

Configuration schemas and models for the DIP SMC PSO project.

Complete Source Code¶

  1#======================================================================================\\\
  2#=============================== src/config/schemas.py ================================\\\
  3#======================================================================================\\\
  4
  5"""Configuration schemas and models for the DIP SMC PSO project."""
  6
  7from __future__ import annotations
  8
  9from types import SimpleNamespace
 10from typing import Any, Dict, List, Optional, Tuple
 11
 12from pydantic import BaseModel, ConfigDict, Field, SecretStr, field_validator, model_validator
 13
 14# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15# Helpers
 16# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17def redact_value(value: Any) -> str:
 18    """Redact sensitive values for logging."""
 19    if isinstance(value, SecretStr):
 20        return "***"
 21    if isinstance(value, str) and any(
 22        keyword in str(value).lower() for keyword in ["password", "secret", "token", "key"]
 23    ):
 24        return "***"
 25    return str(value)
 26
 27# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28# Base strict model
 29# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30class StrictModel(BaseModel):
 31    model_config = ConfigDict(
 32        strict=True,
 33        extra="forbid",
 34        populate_by_name=True,
 35        validate_default=True,
 36        validate_assignment=True,
 37    )
 38
 39# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40# Physics
 41# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42class PhysicsConfig(StrictModel):
 43    cart_mass: float
 44    pendulum1_mass: float
 45    pendulum2_mass: float
 46    pendulum1_length: float
 47    pendulum2_length: float
 48    pendulum1_com: float
 49    pendulum2_com: float
 50    pendulum1_inertia: float
 51    pendulum2_inertia: float
 52    gravity: float
 53    cart_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
 54    joint1_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
 55    joint2_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
 56    singularity_cond_threshold: float = Field(1.0e8, ge=1e4)
 57    regularization: float = Field(1e-10, gt=0.0)
 58    det_threshold: float = Field(1e-12, ge=0.0, le=1e-3)
 59    # Physics effects for full dynamics model
 60    include_coriolis_effects: bool = Field(True)
 61    include_centrifugal_effects: bool = Field(True)
 62    include_gyroscopic_effects: bool = Field(True)
 63
 64    @field_validator(
 65        "cart_mass", "pendulum1_mass", "pendulum2_mass",
 66        "pendulum1_length", "pendulum2_length",
 67        "pendulum1_inertia", "pendulum2_inertia",
 68        "pendulum1_com", "pendulum2_com",
 69        "gravity"
 70    )
 71    @classmethod
 72    def _must_be_strictly_positive(cls, v: float, info) -> float:
 73        if v is None or v <= 0.0:
 74            raise ValueError(f"{info.field_name} must be strictly positive, but got {v}")
 75        return v
 76
 77    @model_validator(mode="after")
 78    def _validate_com_within_length(self) -> "PhysicsConfig":
 79        if self.pendulum1_com >= self.pendulum1_length:
 80            raise ValueError(
 81                f"pendulum1_com ({self.pendulum1_com}) must be less than pendulum1_length ({self.pendulum1_length})"
 82            )
 83        if self.pendulum2_com >= self.pendulum2_length:
 84            raise ValueError(
 85                f"pendulum2_com ({self.pendulum2_com}) must be less than pendulum2_length ({self.pendulum2_length})"
 86            )
 87        return self
 88
 89class PhysicsUncertaintySchema(StrictModel):
 90    n_evals: int
 91    cart_mass: float
 92    pendulum1_mass: float
 93    pendulum2_mass: float
 94    pendulum1_length: float
 95    pendulum2_length: float
 96    pendulum1_com: float
 97    pendulum2_com: float
 98    pendulum1_inertia: float
 99    pendulum2_inertia: float
100    gravity: float
101    cart_friction: float
102    joint1_friction: float
103    joint2_friction: float
104
105# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
106# Simulation
107# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
108class SimulationConfig(StrictModel):
109    duration: float
110    dt: float = 0.01
111    initial_state: Optional[List[float]] = None
112    use_full_dynamics: bool = True
113    sensor_latency: float = Field(0.0, ge=0.0)
114    actuator_latency: float = Field(0.0, ge=0.0)
115    real_time: bool = False
116    raise_on_warning: bool = False
117
118    @field_validator("dt", "duration")
119    @classmethod
120    def _must_be_positive(cls, v: float, info):
121        if v is None or v <= 0.0:
122            raise ValueError(f"{info.field_name} must be > 0")
123        return v
124
125    @model_validator(mode="after")
126    def _duration_at_least_dt(self):
127        if self.duration < self.dt:
128            raise ValueError("simulation.duration must be >= simulation.dt")
129        return self
130
131    @field_validator("initial_state")
132    @classmethod
133    def _initial_state_valid(cls, v):
134        if v is None:
135            return v
136        if not isinstance(v, list) or len(v) == 0:
137            raise ValueError("initial_state must be a non-empty list of floats")
138        if not all(isinstance(x, float) for x in v):
139            raise ValueError("initial_state must contain float values (no implicit casts)")
140        return v
141
142# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
143# Legacy module-level namespace (best-effort)
144# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
145try:
146    if "config" not in globals():
147        config = SimpleNamespace(
148            simulation=SimpleNamespace(
149                use_full_dynamics=False,
150                safety=None,
151            )
152        )
153except Exception:
154    pass
155
156# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
157# Controllers
158# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
159class _BaseControllerConfig(BaseModel):
160    model_config = ConfigDict(extra="forbid")
161    gains: List[float] = Field(default_factory=list, min_length=1)
162
163    def __iter__(self):
164        for k, v in self.model_dump(exclude_unset=True).items():
165            yield k, v
166
167class ControllerConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
168    pass
169
170class ClassicalSMCConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
171    """Configuration for Classical Sliding Mode Controller."""
172    max_force: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
173    boundary_layer: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
174    dt: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
175    rate_weight: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
176    use_adaptive_boundary: Optional[bool] = None
177
178class STASMCConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
179    """Configuration for Super-Twisting Algorithm Sliding Mode Controller."""
180    max_force: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
181    damping_gain: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
182    dt: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
183    boundary_layer: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
184
185class AdaptiveSMCConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
186    """Configuration for Adaptive Sliding Mode Controller."""
187    max_force: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
188    leak_rate: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
189    dead_zone: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
190    adapt_rate_limit: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
191    K_min: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
192    K_max: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
193    dt: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
194    smooth_switch: Optional[bool] = None
195    boundary_layer: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
196
197    @model_validator(mode="after")
198    def _validate_adaptive_bounds(self) -> "AdaptiveSMCConfig":
199        if self.K_min is not None and self.K_max is not None:
200            if self.K_min >= self.K_max:
201                raise ValueError(f"K_min ({self.K_min}) must be less than K_max ({self.K_max})")
202        return self
203
204class SwingUpSMCConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
205    """Configuration for Swing-Up Sliding Mode Controller."""
206    max_force: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
207    stabilizing_controller: Optional[str] = None
208    energy_gain: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
209    switch_energy_factor: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0, le=1.0)
210    switch_angle_tolerance: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
211    exit_energy_factor: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0, le=1.0)
212    reentry_angle_tolerance: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
213
214class HybridAdaptiveSTASMCConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
215    """Configuration for Hybrid Adaptive Super-Twisting Sliding Mode Controller."""
216    max_force: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
217    dt: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
218    k1_init: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
219    k2_init: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
220    gamma1: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
221    gamma2: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
222    dead_zone: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
223    enable_equivalent: Optional[bool] = None
224    damping_gain: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
225    adapt_rate_limit: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
226    sat_soft_width: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
227    cart_gain: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
228    cart_lambda: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
229    cart_p_gain: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0.0)
230    cart_p_lambda: Optional[float] = Field(None, gt=0.0)
231
232    @model_validator(mode="after")
233    def _validate_hybrid_constraints(self) -> "HybridAdaptiveSTASMCConfig":
234        if self.sat_soft_width is not None and self.dead_zone is not None:
235            if self.sat_soft_width < self.dead_zone:
236                raise ValueError(
237                    f"sat_soft_width ({self.sat_soft_width}) must be >= dead_zone ({self.dead_zone})"
238                )
239        return self
240
241class PermissiveControllerConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
242    model_config = ConfigDict(extra="allow")
243    unknown_params: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
244    allow_unknown: bool = False
245
246    @model_validator(mode="after")
247    def _collect_unknown_params(self) -> "PermissiveControllerConfig":
248        extra = getattr(self, "model_extra", None)
249        if extra:
250            unknown = dict(extra)
251            object.__setattr__(self, "unknown_params", unknown)
252            if not self.__class__.allow_unknown:
253                unknown_keys = ", ".join(sorted(unknown.keys()))
254                raise ValueError(
255                    f"Unknown configuration keys: {unknown_keys}. "
256                    "Set allow_unknown=True when calling load_config to accept unknown keys."
257                )
258        return self
259
260def set_allow_unknown_config(_: bool) -> None:
261    """Deprecated - use load_config(..., allow_unknown=True) instead."""
262    raise RuntimeError(
263        "set_allow_unknown_config() is deprecated; use load_config(..., allow_unknown=True) instead."
264    )
265
266class ControllersConfig(StrictModel):
267    classical_smc: Optional[ClassicalSMCConfig] = None
268    sta_smc: Optional[STASMCConfig] = None
269    adaptive_smc: Optional[AdaptiveSMCConfig] = None
270    swing_up_smc: Optional[SwingUpSMCConfig] = None
271    hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc: Optional[HybridAdaptiveSTASMCConfig] = None
272    mpc_controller: Optional[PermissiveControllerConfig] = None
273
274    def keys(self) -> List[str]:
275        return [
276            name for name in (
277                "classical_smc", "sta_smc", "adaptive_smc",
278                "swing_up_smc", "hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc", "mpc_controller",
279            ) if getattr(self, name) is not None
280        ]
281
282    def __iter__(self):
283        for name in self.keys():
284            yield name
285
286    def items(self):
287        for name in self:
288            yield (name, getattr(self, name))
289
290    def __getitem__(self, key: str) -> Any:
291        canonical = str(key).lower().strip().replace("-", "_").replace(" ", "_")
292        if canonical in self.keys():
293            val = getattr(self, canonical)
294            if val is None:
295                raise KeyError(key)
296            return val
297        raise KeyError(key)
298
299# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
300# PSO
301# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
302class PSOBounds(StrictModel):
303    min: List[float]
304    max: List[float]
305
306class PSOBoundsWithControllers(StrictModel):
307    # Default bounds for all controllers
308    min: List[float]
309    max: List[float]
310    # Controller-specific bounds (optional)
311    classical_smc: Optional[PSOBounds] = None
312    sta_smc: Optional[PSOBounds] = None
313    adaptive_smc: Optional[PSOBounds] = None
314    hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc: Optional[PSOBounds] = None
315
316class PSOConfig(StrictModel):
317    n_particles: int = Field(100, ge=1)
318    bounds: PSOBoundsWithControllers
319    w: float = Field(0.5, ge=0.0)
320    c1: float = Field(1.5, ge=0.0)
321    c2: float = Field(1.5, ge=0.0)
322    iters: int = Field(200, ge=1)
323    w_schedule: Optional[Tuple[float, float]] = None
324    velocity_clamp: Optional[Tuple[float, float]] = None
325    n_processes: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=1)
326    hyper_trials: Optional[int] = None
327    hyper_search: Optional[Dict[str, List[float]]] = None
328    study_timeout: Optional[int] = None
329    seed: Optional[int] = None
330    tune: Dict[str, Dict[str, float]] = Field(default_factory=dict)
331
332# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
333# Cost Function
334# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
335class CostFunctionWeights(StrictModel):
336    state_error: float = Field(50.0, ge=0.0)
337    control_effort: float = Field(0.2, ge=0.0)
338    control_rate: float = Field(0.1, ge=0.0)
339    stability: float = Field(0.1, ge=0.0)
340
341class CombineWeights(StrictModel):
342    mean: float = Field(0.7, ge=0.0, le=1.0)
343    max: float = Field(0.3, ge=0.0, le=1.0)
344
345class CostFunctionConfig(StrictModel):
346    weights: CostFunctionWeights
347    baseline: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None  # Optional: legacy baseline normalization
348    norms: Optional[Dict[str, float]] = None   # Optional: explicit normalization constants
349    instability_penalty: float = Field(1000.0, ge=0.0)
350    combine_weights: CombineWeights = CombineWeights()
351    normalization_threshold: float = Field(1e-12, ge=0.0)
352
353# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
354# Verification
355# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
356class VerificationConfig(StrictModel):
357    test_conditions: List[Dict[str, Any]]
358    integrators: List[str]
359    criteria: Dict[str, float]
360
361# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
362# Sensors
363# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
364class SensorsConfig(StrictModel):
365    angle_noise_std: float = 0.0
366    position_noise_std: float = 0.0
367    quantization_angle: float = 0.0
368    quantization_position: float = 0.0
369
370# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
371# HIL
372# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
373class HILConfig(StrictModel):
374    plant_ip: str
375    plant_port: int
376    controller_ip: str
377    controller_port: int
378    extra_latency_ms: float = 0.0
379    sensor_noise_std: float = 0.0
380
381# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
382# FDI
383# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
384class FDIConfig(StrictModel):
385    enabled: bool = False
386    residual_threshold: float = Field(0.5, gt=0)
387    persistence_counter: int = Field(10, ge=1)
388    residual_states: List[int] = Field(default_factory=lambda: [0, 1, 2])
389    residual_weights: Optional[List[float]] = None
390    adaptive: bool = False
391    window_size: int = Field(50, ge=2)
392    threshold_factor: float = Field(3.0, ge=0.0)
393    cusum_enabled: bool = False
394    cusum_threshold: float = Field(5.0, gt=0.0)
395
396    @field_validator("residual_states")
397    @classmethod
398    def _validate_residual_states(cls, v: List[int]) -> List[int]:
399        if not v:
400            raise ValueError("residual_states must not be empty")
401        if any(idx < 0 for idx in v):
402            raise ValueError("residual_states must contain non-negative indices")
403        if any(idx >= 6 for idx in v):
404            raise ValueError(
405                f"residual_states contains invalid indices {v}; valid state indices are 0-5"
406            )
407        return v
408
409    @model_validator(mode="after")
410    def _validate_weights_length(self) -> "FDIConfig":
411        w = getattr(self, "residual_weights", None)
412        if w is not None:
413            if len(w) != len(self.residual_states):
414                raise ValueError(
415                    f"residual_weights length {len(w)} does not match residual_states length"
416                )
417            if any((ww is None or ww < 0.0) for ww in w):
418                raise ValueError("residual_weights must contain non-negative numbers")
419        return self
420
421
422# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
423# Stability Monitoring (Issue #1 Resolution)
424# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
425class LDRConfig(StrictModel):
426    """Lyapunov Decrease Ratio monitoring configuration."""
427    threshold: float = Field(0.95, ge=0.0, le=1.0)
428    window_ms: float = Field(300.0, gt=0.0)
429    transient_time: float = Field(1.0, ge=0.0)
430
431
432class SaturationConfig(StrictModel):
433    """Saturation monitoring configuration."""
434    duty_threshold: float = Field(0.2, ge=0.0, le=1.0)
435    rate_hit_threshold: float = Field(0.01, ge=0.0, le=1.0)
436    max_continuous_ms: float = Field(200.0, gt=0.0)
437    window_ms: float = Field(1000.0, gt=0.0)
438    transient_time: float = Field(1.0, ge=0.0)
439
440
441class ConditioningConfig(StrictModel):
442    """Dynamics conditioning monitoring configuration."""
443    median_threshold: float = Field(1e7, gt=0.0)
444    spike_threshold: float = Field(1e9, gt=0.0)
445    fallback_threshold: int = Field(3, ge=0)
446    window_ms: float = Field(1000.0, gt=0.0)
447
448
449class DiagnosticsConfig(StrictModel):
450    """Diagnostic checklist configuration."""
451    auto_classify: bool = True
452    store_history: bool = True
453    max_history: int = Field(1000, ge=0)
454
455
456class StabilityMonitoringConfig(StrictModel):
457    """Stability monitoring configuration for Issue #1 resolution."""
458    enabled: bool = True
459    ldr: LDRConfig = Field(default_factory=LDRConfig)
460    saturation: SaturationConfig = Field(default_factory=SaturationConfig)
461    conditioning: ConditioningConfig = Field(default_factory=ConditioningConfig)
462    diagnostics: DiagnosticsConfig = Field(default_factory=DiagnosticsConfig)
463
464# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
465# Fault Detection (Issue #18 Resolution - Threshold Calibration)
466# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
467class FaultDetectionConfig(StrictModel):
468    """Fault Detection and Isolation (FDI) configuration - Issue #18 resolution."""
469
470    residual_threshold: float = Field(
471        default=0.150,
472        ge=0.0,
473        description="Statistically calibrated threshold (P99 percentile)"
474    )
475    hysteresis_enabled: bool = Field(
476        default=True,
477        description="Enable hysteresis to prevent threshold oscillation"
478    )
479    hysteresis_upper: float = Field(
480        default=0.165,
481        ge=0.0,
482        description="Upper bound triggers fault (threshold * 1.1)"
483    )
484    hysteresis_lower: float = Field(
485        default=0.135,
486        ge=0.0,
487        description="Lower bound for recovery (threshold * 0.9)"
488    )
489    persistence_counter: int = Field(
490        default=10,
491        ge=1,
492        description="Consecutive violations required to trigger fault"
493    )
494    adaptive: bool = Field(
495        default=False,
496        description="Use adaptive threshold (vs fixed)"
497    )
498    window_size: int = Field(
499        default=50,
500        ge=1,
501        description="Window size for adaptive mode"
502    )
503    threshold_factor: float = Field(
504        default=3.0,
505        ge=0.0,
506        description="N-sigma rule for adaptive mode"
507    )

1class StrictModel(BaseModel):

7        validate_assignment=True,

 1class PhysicsConfig(StrictModel):
 2    cart_mass: float
 3    pendulum1_mass: float
 4    pendulum2_mass: float
 5    pendulum1_length: float
 6    pendulum2_length: float
 7    pendulum1_com: float
 8    pendulum2_com: float
 9    pendulum1_inertia: float
10    pendulum2_inertia: float
11    gravity: float
12    cart_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
13    joint1_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
14    joint2_friction: float = Field(..., ge=0.0)
15    singularity_cond_threshold: float = Field(1.0e8, ge=1e4)
16    regularization: float = Field(1e-10, gt=0.0)
17    det_threshold: float = Field(1e-12, ge=0.0, le=1e-3)
18    # Physics effects for full dynamics model
19    include_coriolis_effects: bool = Field(True)
20    include_centrifugal_effects: bool = Field(True)
21    include_gyroscopic_effects: bool = Field(True)
22
23    @field_validator(
24        "cart_mass", "pendulum1_mass", "pendulum2_mass",
25        "pendulum1_length", "pendulum2_length",
26        "pendulum1_inertia", "pendulum2_inertia",
27        "pendulum1_com", "pendulum2_com",
28        "gravity"
29    )
30    @classmethod
31    def _must_be_strictly_positive(cls, v: float, info) -> float:
32        if v is None or v <= 0.0:
33            raise ValueError(f"{info.field_name} must be strictly positive, but got {v}")
34        return v
35
36    @model_validator(mode="after")
37    def _validate_com_within_length(self) -> "PhysicsConfig":
38        if self.pendulum1_com >= self.pendulum1_length:
39            raise ValueError(
40                f"pendulum1_com ({self.pendulum1_com}) must be less than pendulum1_length ({self.pendulum1_length})"
41            )
42        if self.pendulum2_com >= self.pendulum2_length:
43            raise ValueError(
44                f"pendulum2_com ({self.pendulum2_com}) must be less than pendulum2_length ({self.pendulum2_length})"
45            )
46        return self

SimulationConfig¶

Inherits from: StrictModel

Source Code¶

 1class SimulationConfig(StrictModel):
 2    duration: float
 3    dt: float = 0.01
 4    initial_state: Optional[List[float]] = None
 5    use_full_dynamics: bool = True
 6    sensor_latency: float = Field(0.0, ge=0.0)
 7    actuator_latency: float = Field(0.0, ge=0.0)
 8    real_time: bool = False
 9    raise_on_warning: bool = False
10
11    @field_validator("dt", "duration")
12    @classmethod
13    def _must_be_positive(cls, v: float, info):
14        if v is None or v <= 0.0:
15            raise ValueError(f"{info.field_name} must be > 0")
16        return v
17
18    @model_validator(mode="after")
19    def _duration_at_least_dt(self):
20        if self.duration < self.dt:
21            raise ValueError("simulation.duration must be >= simulation.dt")
22        return self
23
24    @field_validator("initial_state")
25    @classmethod
26    def _initial_state_valid(cls, v):
27        if v is None:
28            return v
29        if not isinstance(v, list) or len(v) == 0:
30            raise ValueError("initial_state must be a non-empty list of floats")
31        if not all(isinstance(x, float) for x in v):
32            raise ValueError("initial_state must contain float values (no implicit casts)")
33        return v

PermissiveControllerConfig¶

Inherits from: _BaseControllerConfig

Source Code¶

 1class PermissiveControllerConfig(_BaseControllerConfig):
 2    model_config = ConfigDict(extra="allow")
 3    unknown_params: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
 4    allow_unknown: bool = False
 5
 6    @model_validator(mode="after")
 7    def _collect_unknown_params(self) -> "PermissiveControllerConfig":
 8        extra = getattr(self, "model_extra", None)
 9        if extra:
10            unknown = dict(extra)
11            object.__setattr__(self, "unknown_params", unknown)
12            if not self.__class__.allow_unknown:
13                unknown_keys = ", ".join(sorted(unknown.keys()))
14                raise ValueError(
15                    f"Unknown configuration keys: {unknown_keys}. "
16                    "Set allow_unknown=True when calling load_config to accept unknown keys."
17                )
18        return self

ControllersConfig¶

Inherits from: StrictModel

Source Code¶

 1class ControllersConfig(StrictModel):
 2    classical_smc: Optional[ClassicalSMCConfig] = None
 3    sta_smc: Optional[STASMCConfig] = None
 4    adaptive_smc: Optional[AdaptiveSMCConfig] = None
 5    swing_up_smc: Optional[SwingUpSMCConfig] = None
 6    hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc: Optional[HybridAdaptiveSTASMCConfig] = None
 7    mpc_controller: Optional[PermissiveControllerConfig] = None
 8
 9    def keys(self) -> List[str]:
10        return [
11            name for name in (
12                "classical_smc", "sta_smc", "adaptive_smc",
13                "swing_up_smc", "hybrid_adaptive_sta_smc", "mpc_controller",
14            ) if getattr(self, name) is not None
15        ]
16
17    def __iter__(self):
18        for name in self.keys():
19            yield name
20
21    def items(self):
22        for name in self:
23            yield (name, getattr(self, name))
24
25    def __getitem__(self, key: str) -> Any:
26        canonical = str(key).lower().strip().replace("-", "_").replace(" ", "_")
27        if canonical in self.keys():
28            val = getattr(self, canonical)
29            if val is None:
30                raise KeyError(key)
31            return val
32        raise KeyError(key)

FDIConfig¶

Inherits from: StrictModel

Source Code¶

 1class FDIConfig(StrictModel):
 2    enabled: bool = False
 3    residual_threshold: float = Field(0.5, gt=0)
 4    persistence_counter: int = Field(10, ge=1)
 5    residual_states: List[int] = Field(default_factory=lambda: [0, 1, 2])
 6    residual_weights: Optional[List[float]] = None
 7    adaptive: bool = False
 8    window_size: int = Field(50, ge=2)
 9    threshold_factor: float = Field(3.0, ge=0.0)
10    cusum_enabled: bool = False
11    cusum_threshold: float = Field(5.0, gt=0.0)
12
13    @field_validator("residual_states")
14    @classmethod
15    def _validate_residual_states(cls, v: List[int]) -> List[int]:
16        if not v:
17            raise ValueError("residual_states must not be empty")
18        if any(idx < 0 for idx in v):
19            raise ValueError("residual_states must contain non-negative indices")
20        if any(idx >= 6 for idx in v):
21            raise ValueError(
22                f"residual_states contains invalid indices {v}; valid state indices are 0-5"
23            )
24        return v
25
26    @model_validator(mode="after")
27    def _validate_weights_length(self) -> "FDIConfig":
28        w = getattr(self, "residual_weights", None)
29        if w is not None:
30            if len(w) != len(self.residual_states):
31                raise ValueError(
32                    f"residual_weights length {len(w)} does not match residual_states length"
33                )
34            if any((ww is None or ww < 0.0) for ww in w):
35                raise ValueError("residual_weights must contain non-negative numbers")
36        return self

Source Code¶

 1class FaultDetectionConfig(StrictModel):
 2    """Fault Detection and Isolation (FDI) configuration - Issue #18 resolution."""
 3
 4    residual_threshold: float = Field(
 5        default=0.150,
 6        ge=0.0,
 7        description="Statistically calibrated threshold (P99 percentile)"
 8    )
 9    hysteresis_enabled: bool = Field(
10        default=True,
11        description="Enable hysteresis to prevent threshold oscillation"
12    )
13    hysteresis_upper: float = Field(
14        default=0.165,
15        ge=0.0,
16        description="Upper bound triggers fault (threshold * 1.1)"
17    )
18    hysteresis_lower: float = Field(
19        default=0.135,
20        ge=0.0,
21        description="Lower bound for recovery (threshold * 0.9)"
22    )
23    persistence_counter: int = Field(
24        default=10,
25        ge=1,
26        description="Consecutive violations required to trigger fault"
27    )
28    adaptive: bool = Field(
29        default=False,
30        description="Use adaptive threshold (vs fixed)"
31    )
32    window_size: int = Field(
33        default=50,
34        ge=1,
35        description="Window size for adaptive mode"
36    )
37    threshold_factor: float = Field(
38        default=3.0,
39        ge=0.0,
40        description="N-sigma rule for adaptive mode"
41    )

Functions¶

redact_value(value)¶

Redact sensitive values for logging.

Source Code¶

1def redact_value(value: Any) -> str:
2    """Redact sensitive values for logging."""
3    if isinstance(value, SecretStr):
4        return "***"
5    if isinstance(value, str) and any(
6        keyword in str(value).lower() for keyword in ["password", "secret", "token", "key"]
7    ):
8        return "***"
9    return str(value)

set_allow_unknown_config(_)¶

Deprecated - use load_config(…, allow_unknown=True) instead.

Source Code¶

1def set_allow_unknown_config(_: bool) -> None:
2    """Deprecated - use load_config(..., allow_unknown=True) instead."""
3    raise RuntimeError(
4        "set_allow_unknown_config() is deprecated; use load_config(..., allow_unknown=True) instead."
5    )
